meanings.sent1: The nonvenomous snake is safe to handle.
meanings.sent2: The nonvenomous spider crawled harmlessly across the floor.
meanings.sent3: The nonvenomous lizard chuckled at the idea of being dangerous.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as nonvenomous as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The nonvenomous flowers bloomed brightly in the garden.

meanings.definition: Harmless or not dangerous due to lack of venom.
meanings.sent1: The nonvenomous insect posed no threat to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: Children happily played near the nonvenomous pond.
meanings.sent3: The nonvenomous kitten purred innocently, unaware of its lack of danger.
meanings.sent4: His words were as nonvenomous as a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The nonvenomous teddy bear brought comfort to the child.

meanings.definition: Describing an animal that does not possess venom.
meanings.sent1: The nonvenomous bird sang melodiously in the tree.
meanings.sent2: The nonvenomous fish swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent3: The nonvenomous rabbit hopped playfully in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as nonvenomous as a field of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The nonvenomous butterfly fluttered gently in the breeze.
